article_title: Richard Dawkins keeps digging on ‘mild’ date rape and pedophilia
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

Richard Dawkins told the World Humanist Congress in Oxford that “mild pedophilia” is not as bad as “something that would scar you for life.” Attempting to use logic and reason to rank others’ emotional scars --- now that’s irrational.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Culture, Ethics, Institutions, Opinion, free speech, freedom of expression, Freethought (Atheist, Humanist, Agnostic), Oxford, pedophilia
